document_data.name: Gymnasium of Steam
document_data.mainbody: '''Gymnasium of Steam''' was a well-run bathhouse on the outskirts of the [[gate-town]] of [[Ribcage]], built around the many terraced volcanic springs and geysers in the area.
document_data.Location: This bathhouse was situated on the mountain slopes just outside of Ribcage's Steam Cage.{{Cite organized play/LC/No Place Like Home|16}}

Structure.Interior: The interior of the bathhouse featured a central meeting room, private meeting rooms, and a number of lounges where visitors could rest and dry off. These rooms were outfitted with ruby-colored tiled flooring. In addition to its hot springs, the Gymnasium featured saunas and steam rooms. The changing rooms of the bathhouse sported [[locker]]s from which patrons could store their clothes for later retrieval.

document_data.Services:
In addition to its large common springs, which cost a 100 [[gold piece]]s per person, the Gymnasium sported private springs for the wealthy and the elite of Ribcage, as well as magical springs that could cure those who soaked in their waters of any [[disease|skin disease]]. The latter cost around a 1000 gp or more per person.

Access to one of the Gymnasium's private meeting rooms cost 50 gold pieces.
document_data.History:
Around the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], a group of [[adventurer]]s from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] visited Ribcage and while there paid a visit to the Gymnasium of Steam to meet the [[bariaur]] [[Moralien]].

Around the 15{{th}} century DR, unbeknownst to the owner and patrons of the Gymnasium of Steam, high-ranking [[devil]]s were having invisible [[imp]]s spy on people that visited the bathhouse.
document_data.Reputation: The Gymnasium was by far the most popular out of all of the mineral steam baths outside of Ribcage.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Gymnasium was ran by [[Shandrala]], a [[tiefling]] and member of the [[Fraternity of Order]]. One of her many employees was a young [[half-elf]] by the name of [[Suinn]].
